SELECT bbd.investment_time, bbd.interest_time, bbd.investment_amount, bb.bor_deadline, bbd.award_amount, pia.invest_award_value, ( ( ifnull(pia.invest_award_value, 0) + ifnull(bb.borrow_rate,0) ) * ifnull(bb.bor_deadline, 0) * ifnull(bbd.investment_amount, 0)/100 ) interest, bb.bor_status, bb.borrow_code, bb.borrow_name, bb.borrow_rate FROM t_biz_borrow_detail bbd LEFT JOIN t_biz_borrow bb ON bbd.borrow_id = bb.PID LEFT JOIN t_cust_customer cc ON bbd.customer_id = cc.PID LEFT JOIN t_pub_invest_award pia ON bbd.invest_award_id = pia.PID LEFT JOIN t_pub_vipinfo pv ON bbd.vipinfo_id = pv.PID AND cc.pid = #{bizBorrowDetail.pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
